pullrequest.title: Remove minor version in gazebo filesystem paths

content.raw:
sorry a bit late on this, I read over the email thread and just confirm what this does here: From now on, the media files should be compatible between gazebo minor versions right? 

Should be mostly ok. One corner case I could think of is that if we remove an entry in the material file that the user depends on in their plugin, it will throw an ogre exception. We'll just have to make sure we don't do that.
content.html:
sorry a bit late on this, I read over the email thread and just confirm what this does here: From now on, the media files should be compatible between gazebo minor versions right?

Should be mostly ok. One corner case I could think of is that if we remove an entry in the material file that the user depends on in their plugin, it will throw an ogre exception. We'll just have to make sure we don't do that.
